 Rivian R2Rivian Removes 2027 Timeline From Europe R2 PageJose Castillo02/15/2026No CommentsRivian has quietly removed the 2027 timeline from its European R2 website, replacing it with a simple sign up page and no official launch year. While nothing has been formally announced, the move follows Canada’s shift to a 2027 release and suggests Rivian is concentrating heavily on a US first rollout, leaving Europe’s R2 timing increasingly uncertain.

With manufacturing validation builds complete and deliveries still targeted for Q2 2026, Rivian is preparing for its biggest launch yet. At the same time, autonomy hardware, in house silicon, and surging software revenue are starting to reshape the company’s financial story as it pushes toward scale.
